text:
February 22, 1962
Mr. Jack P. Summerfield
600 W. 116th Street
New York 27, New York
Dear Jack:
Vm delighted that you have been appointed to serve on the
NAEB Public Relations committee and am looking forward to
working with you during the coming year.
The first project is a very urgent one.. .National Head¬
quarters would like you and Gertrude Broderick to work with
Lrew Rhodes in composing a welcome letter for all new individ¬
ual WAEB members. I am confident you could contribute a
great many valuable suggestions to this sub-committee.
Harold Hill will be sending you further details. He will
also supply you with copies of the materials currently in use
for individual members.
Cordially,
Marion Corwell, Manager
Educational Television and
MCi» Chairman, NAEB P. R. Committee
cc: Harold Hill
